msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at all sides. 2 kolleseis. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Pakysis, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 106)
Heras alias Aphrodisios, son of Heras, grandson of Petheus, mother Apolonarion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 168)
Nemesas, slave of Apollonous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 190)
Kastor, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 181)
Phasis, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 246)
Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Maron, son of Satabous, grandson of Maron, mother Tkonnous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 187)
Menches, brother, of the same mother (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 187)
Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapsas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245)
Anchoryphis, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchoryphis, mother Apollonous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 149)
Heras, son of Petheus, son of Heras, mother Didymarion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 169)
Maron, son of Maron, grandson of Petoraipis, mother Herois (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 186)
Leonides, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 184)
Levas, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tapapeis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 184)
Dioskoros, son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthos, mother Taorsenouphis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 162)
Petermouthis, son of Kastor, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 210)
Herakleides, son of Esouris, grandson of Kollouthos, mother Taonnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 167)
Perigenes, son of Zoilos, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Sambathion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 208)
Sisois, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Herakles, mother Tkonnous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 229)
Phaseis, son of Pakysis, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tanebkenis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 246)
Ischyras, son of Panesneus, grandson of Ischyras, mother Tamysthas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 179)
Mystharion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 188)
Aphrodisis, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)
Petheus, son of Pakysis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamaron (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 202)
Ptolemaios, son of Esouris, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Ptolemaios, son of Apynchis, grandson of Aunes, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Heras, son of Onnophris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Sopas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 169)
Kopaneus, son of Polyntion, grandson of Kopaneus, mother Politta (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 184)
Didymos, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 161)
Polis, son of Petheus, grandson of Keras, mother Herais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)
Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Segathis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: " Column 3;Pakysis, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, 4drachmas,;the total for the day, 112 drachmas;;The 14th of the same (month); ;Heras alias Aphrodisios, son of Heras, grandson of Petheus, mother Apolonarion, 12drachmas;;Nemesas, slave of Apollonous, 12 drachmas;;Kastor, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia, 8 drachmas, 8 obols;;The same12th year, 8 bronze drachmas, the remainder is the administrator fee;;Phasis, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, 4 drachmas;;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, 4 drachmas;;Maron, son of Satabous, grandson of Maron, mother Tkonnous, 4 drachmas;;Menches, brother, of the same mother, 4 drachmas;;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapsas, 8 drachmas;;Anchoryphis, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchoryphis, mother Apollonous, 12 drachmas;;Heras, son of Petheus, son of Heras, mother Didymarion, 4 drachmas;;Maron, son of Maron, grandson of Petoraipis, mother Herois, 12 drachmas;;Leonides, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras, 8 drachmas;;Levas, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tapapeis, 8 drachmas;;Dioskoros, son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthos, mother Taorsenouphis, 8 drachmas;;Petermouthis, son of Kastor, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tasoucharion, 16 drachmas;;The total for the day, 136 drachmas of which for the12th year 8 drachmas, 20 obols;;The 15th of the same (month);;Herakleides, son of Esouris, grandson of Kollouthos, mother Taonnophris, 20 drachmas;;The same12th year, the remainder is the administrator fee;;Perigenes, son of Zoilos, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Sambathion, 4 drachmas;;Sisois, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Herakles, mother Tkonnous, 8 drachmas;;The12th year: Phaseis, son of Pakysis, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tanebkenis, 8 bronze drachmas;;Ischyras, son of Panesneus, grandson of Ischyras, mother Tamysthas, 8 drachmas;;Mystharion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Thaesis, 8 drachmas;;Aphrodisis, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, 8 drachmas, 27 obols;;Petheus, son of Pakysis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamaron, 8 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Esouris, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, 8 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Apynchis, grandson of Aunes, mother Tapetheus, 16 drachmas;;Heras, son of Onnophris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Sopas, 4 drachmas;;Kopaneus, son of Polyntion, grandson of Kopaneus, mother Politta, 16 drachmas;;Didymos, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis, 4 drachmas;;Polis, son of Petheus, grandson of Keras, mother Herais, 8 drachmas;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Segathis, 8 drachmas."
